Topic.Title: Convert to z machine or other formats

Posts.EditableText:
Does anyone know if there is a converter for .quest files to convert them in to other commons formats ?

Olly
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:

As in Basic, C, or html???

Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: As in being able to convert the .quest file format to z machine, or Glulx, or other text adventure and interactive fiction formats.
Posts.HTML: As in being able to convert the .quest file format to z machine, or Glulx, or other text adventure and interactive fiction formats.

Posts.EditableText:
Your best bet, is to learn Quest and the one you want to convert it to and do that...
Just like I am moving from Basic to Quest.

Posts.EditableText: Glulx is an interpreter for Inform. Which is a different programming language for IF.
Posts.HTML: Glulx is an interpreter for Inform. Which is a different programming language for IF.
